title: Design
text: We are able to translate business requirements into high level designs which could then be used within a RFP process to ask Cloud Vendors to bid for work

title: Honest Broker
text: We are able to provide honest cloud service provider GAP analysis, offer your company the "industry insider" during vendor selection

title: Deliver
text: We are able to commit a team of technical engineers delivering specific projects. Within the delivery, we will provide resources and build documentation

title: Post Installation Audit
text: We are able to review your existing cloud delivery, assist in improving it and provide consultants to help support your platform

title: Operations
text: We are able to hand over documentation to support your team
